Posts.Content: Hello everybody, I am new here. Was diagnosed with stage 2B grade3 triple Neg. in july of this yr. Had a lumpectomy, 10 nodes out and just finished 2nd cycle of AC. Plodding along, have 14 more cycles to go and then the radaiton. My mom is in remission for the past 6 yrs for excatly the same type. yesterday my sister had her mammo and found some calcifications. Has her biopsy in a week. Crossing my fingers. Waiting to catch a break. need some good vibes now. Sorry to be venting I am sure everybody has their own issues. Thanks for listening
Posts.Title: wanted to vent - sorry
